query:
UPDATE wiki_places
        SET
            name = COALESCE($2, name),
            category = COALESCE($3, category),
            address = COALESCE($4, address),
            latitude = COALESCE($5, latitude),
            longitude = COALESCE($6, longitude),
            metadata = $7,
            updated_at = datetime('now')
        WHERE id = $1
